title: Agent Identity
description: Agent identity metadata (agent.yaml) - fields that define what the agent is and never change between versions

developer.description: Developer GitHub username (must match folder name)

description.description: Short description of what the agent does

container_image.description: Container image reference without tag (e.g., docker.io/user/agent or harbor.example.com/project/agent)

primary_function.description: Primary function category (e.g., research, create, process, monitor, automate, analyze)
